title: Add admin login link

requirements.text: Add a dedicated admin login link to the Layout.tsx header component that navigates to /admin when clicked, positioned near the user profile or settings area
acceptanceCriteria: An admin login link is visible in the header for all users
Clicking the link navigates to the /admin route (AdminDashboard page)
The link is styled consistently with other header navigation elements
The link is accessible from all pages in the application

requirements.text: Add an admin login shortcut link to the HomePage.tsx hero section or below it, prominently displayed for easy admin access
acceptanceCriteria: A clearly labeled admin login link appears on the homepage
The link navigates to /admin when clicked
The link is visually distinct but does not dominate the hero section
The link is accessible to both authenticated and unauthenticated users

constraints: Do not modify the useInternetIdentity.ts or useActor.ts hooks
Do not change the existing admin authorization logic in the backend
The admin dashboard route (/admin) already exists and should remain unchanged
nonGoals: Creating a separate admin authentication system beyond Internet Identity
Modifying the existing admin token initialization mechanism
Adding role-based UI rendering that hides the link from non-admin users
Creating a dedicated admin login page separate from the admin dashboard
